item.description:
Please read the full description from top to bottom, before you RSVP Yes.


GPS coordinates: 43.725359, -71.237348
Map of 43.725359, -71.237348

Distance: ~ 9 miles
Elevation gain: ~3000 ft
Book Time: ~6 hours

We will start from Merrowvista Campground, follow trail to Mt. Flagg, then on to Mt. Shaw. We will return the same way by Flagg but split off around Canaan over to Sentinel, then return to MerrrowVista Campground. This hike is about 9 miles with under 3000 ft of vertical, with plenty of views.

Forecast is for 0-10% chance of rain, 30-40% cloud cover. Temps in 20s-30s with winds in the teens, so be prepared for winter like temps.

It is hunting season for deer with rifle. So wear hunters orange, bright colored clothing, and make yourself clearly seen.



Please keep your rsvp's up to date. Its very important that we have a true headcount, and not worry that your late or lost.

Make sure your hiker profile is complete so we can verify that your qualified to join us on this White Mountain hike.

See What to wear on a hike and pack water and food.

Your response/signing up for a hike certifies that you have read, understand, and agree with the NEHAAG disclaimer.

Carpooling is always advised and a great way to get to know your fellow members.
item.name: Ossipee Mtns - Mt. Shaw, Flagg, & Sentinel
